summary: A Magical Society Bundle Offer - A new bundle, A Magical Society, presents historical sourcebooks and 'Aggressive Ecologies' from Expeditious Retreat Press. These system-neutral tabletop roleplaying game supplements, full of ready-to-run systems, generators, gameable nuts-and-bolts details about the High Middle Ages, let you create terrain, cultures, kingdoms, landholdings, economies, and trade routes that help make every fantasy campaign setting more authentic and believable.
